{"step_by_step_thinking": "Fluorosis is a condition that affects the teeth caused by overexposure to fluoride during the first eight years of life. This is the time when most permanent teeth are being formed. The etching time in teeth with fluorosis is usually longer than normal teeth because the enamel is harder and more resistant to the etching process. Therefore, the etching time would be longer than 15-30 seconds.", "answer_choice": "C. 60-90 sec"}
